title: Designing an Architecture Education Curriculum Utilizing Facebook-Based Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic architectural theories and design principles
context.additional_context: Constructing a collaborative learning environment using Facebook groups in a smartphone-centric limited-technology setting

learning_goals: Learners can improve architectural project solutions by over 80% through peer feedback and instructor support within a Facebook group.
Learners can perform knowledge sharing and collaborative problem-solving at each stage of the architectural design process five or more times through Facebook collaboration activities.
Learners can document reflective thinking about their own architectural design process four or more times through Facebook-based reflective journaling.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
